basics.name: Ayman Elkfrawy
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I'm a Software Engineer passionate about technology and software development. I like hacking my way through electronics as it is with software development with a passion seeing both working together. I'm interested also in Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence where most of computer magic goes

highlights: Maintain a web-based application that manages business processes for insurance companies by fixing customer bugs and implementing new features
Fix Sonar issues and applying best practices on various Company Java based products to increase performance, reduce bugs and improve readability
Worked on 5 different company products and about 20 different open source projects
Teach undergraduate sections and labs, and grading exams
Help students with their graduation projects. Helping with project design to achieve its goals, the problems they might face and how to fix them and project documentations
Coducting a research about Recommendation Systems for social networks
Courses I taught: Embedded Systems, Introduction to Artificial Intelligent, Introduction to Compilers, Numerical Analysis, Communication Systems, FPGA.

volunteer.summary: Instructed Java and C# courses at Summer School 2010

awards.title: Won two prizes in the IEEE Computer Society International Student Competition 2010
